chapter.title: First steps in OTRS::ITSM
chapter.para: The firt thing that you might notice is that OTRS::ITSM uses the agent and customer interfaces (customer frontend) we first implemented with our core OTRS product. Therefore if you have previous experience with using OTRS, you should see many familiar features and feel right at home. Even better, if you have an existing OTRS install, all features and steps such as login, queue configuration, user preferences, filters, rules, user permissions etc. can continued to be used without any additional work.
